item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 10, 2024 at 5:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. JVM Anatomy Quarks (13 points | discuss)
2. Show HN: Chonkie – A Fast, Lightweight Text Chunking Library for RAG (17 points | 3 comments)
3. Typesetting Engines: A Programmer's Perspective (22 points | 2 comments)
4. Dobble (The Mathematics Of) (2018) (40 points | 5 comments)
5. The Principles of Mr. Harrison's Time-Keeper (34 points | 6 comments)
6. Mind-Bending Soviet Era Oil Rig City on the Caspian Sea (143 points | 45 comments)
7. Audio Decomposition – open-source seperation of music to constituent instruments (186 points | 45 comments)
8. OpenCoder: Open Cookbook for Top-Tier Code Large Language Models (531 points | 64 comments)
9. IronCalc – Open-Source Spreadsheet Engine (578 points | 169 comments)
10. Ratting on wildlife crime: training rats to detect illegally trafficked wildlife (7 points | discuss)
11. 19th Century Map Shows a Fictional Country Created by a Con Man (37 points | 11 comments)
12. Functional architecture of cerebral cortex during naturalistic movie watching (6 points | discuss)
13. NYC Subway Station Layouts (263 points | 84 comments)
14. Show HN: Jaws – a JavaScript to WASM ahead-of-time compiler (247 points | 97 comments)
15. Shaderblocks: Block-based image editing (109 points | 28 comments)
16. Show HN: Visprex – Open-source, in-browser data visualisation tool for CSV files (165 points | 24 comments)
17. Mergiraf: a syntax-aware merge driver for Git (388 points | 81 comments)
18. AI-Time Travel-Street View (14 points | 10 comments)
19. GenMC: Model checking for concurrent C programs (42 points | 2 comments)
20. FrontierMath: A benchmark for evaluating advanced mathematical reasoning in AI (146 points | 77 comments)
21. When machine learning tells the wrong story (235 points | 21 comments)
22. A skeleton made from the bones of at least eight people thousands of years apart (97 points | 33 comments)
23. Show HN: HTML-to-Markdown – convert entire websites to Markdown with Golang/CLI (319 points | 47 comments)
24. Grim Fandango (276 points | 91 comments)
25. Texture-Less Text Rendering (204 points | 51 comments)
26. Hard Cases for a Handle Theory (31 points | 4 comments)
27. Notes on Guyana (176 points | 122 comments)
28. Obtainium: Get Android App Updates Directly from the Source (214 points | 84 comments)
29. Somebody moved the UK's oldest satellite in the mid 1970s, but no one knows who (152 points | 83 comments)
30. Early Cascade Injection: From Windows process creation to stealthy injection (113 points | 12 comments)
